Greetings, I am an interactive designer passionate about developing delightful design systems.

I was born and raised on the sunny island of O’ahu, Hawai’i and I currently live in foggy San Francisco.

I can recite 96% of every Drake song by memory. I nerd out over Wes Anderson movies (my favorite is Moonrise Kingdom). My friends and I get together over the weekend and bbq at @smokedmeatsaturdays.

Tweet me @darrendub or email me. You can also find my pixels on dribbble and my code on github.

Hand-typed by Darren Wong in San Francisco, California.
